      • verifyTrue

        public static void verifyTrue(String message,
                              boolean condition)
        Verifies that a condition is true. If it isn't it throws an VerificationError with the given message.
        Parameters:
        message - the identifying message for the VerificationError (null okay)
        condition - condition to be checked

      • verifyTrue

        public static void verifyTrue(boolean condition)
        Verifies that a condition is true. If it isn't it throws an VerificationError without a message.
        Parameters:
        condition - condition to be checked

        condition - condition to be checked
